page.title: 10June Fayre,Kingsbury School.
page.content: Every year we have a June fayre at school.This year we had stalls selling sweets,pizzas,cakes,plants,jumble and toys.There were also games,which were treasure hunt,hoopla,skittles,marbles into a flower pot,lucky dip,throwing wet sponges at men in a pillory and a putting game.The money we raised was for the school swimming pool and the school fund.Bugs Bunny opened the fayre at 3:00pm.He threw sweets for the children.The Kingsbury Episcopi band played music of different kinds throughout the afternoon.There was also an exhibition of toys in one of the school classrooms.This included a collection of 52 teddy bears and some were very old.They were all owned by the same family.There was a railway set which took about 12 hours to set up.
